name: Warwind
description:
WAR WIND is an open world shmuptroidvania game with a focus on challenging , yet rewarding bullet hell boss fights- and achieving a sense of exploration in a vast open world . Fight your way through 4 different areas and unlock new ships by killing bosses !


Controls
  •     Use the arrow keys to move
  •     Use the X key to shoot
  •     Use the Z key to dash
Behind the Scenes

WARWIND was solo developed over a month to take part in the Lazy Dev's "SHMUP Showcase" . I'd like to thank everyone that offered feedback on the game during development , particularly in the Lazy Devs discord community .

Unfortunately I didn't get the time to make the final boss in time for the deadline , so be sure to keep in touch with me at 0xFFB3 on twitter . It shouldn't take too long , and I'll be updating this page when it's ready !

I have the game marked as paid to download , but if you really want to mod the game and genuinely can't afford the $2 message me on twitter and we can chat !

Want to make content about Warwind ?

 Check out my presskit ! There you can find lots of screenshots and transparent branding , useful for reviews and thumbnails !
